posts.body: Free Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Training & Certification Oracle is offering free Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) Training and Certification for all our clients and partners who will sit the Certification exam before 30th December 2021. Find the link to the training and certification resources here https://bit.ly/3j391YG
